'''Tobias Ahlin''' was the lead experience designer at [[Mojang Studios]]. He joined the company on January 2, 2017.<ref>{{tweet|tobiasahlin|815926039289294848|Hello new adventure! So excited today to join @Kappische @jeb_ @vubui and many more at @Mojang to make great things for @Minecraft|January 2, 2017}}</ref> Before joining Mojang, he also developed for companies such as Spotify and GitHub.
